name: Vibrant Sunset
description: エネルギッシュで温かみのあるグラデーションテーマ
mood: エネルギッシュ、創造的、温かい
use_cases: クリエイティブツール

button.primary: bg-gradient-to-r from-primary-500 to-secondary-500 hover:from-primary-600 hover:to-secondary-600 text-white font-semibold rounded-xl px-6 py-3 shadow-lg transition-all duration-300
button.secondary: bg-gradient-to-r from-secondary-400 to-accent-400 hover:from-secondary-500 hover:to-accent-500 text-white font-semibold rounded-xl px-6 py-3 shadow-lg transition-all duration-300
button.outline: border-2 border-primary-500 text-primary-600 hover:bg-primary-50 font-semibold rounded-xl px-6 py-3 transition-all duration-200

card.default: bg-white border-2 border-primary-100 rounded-2xl shadow-md p-6
card.gradient: bg-gradient-to-br from-primary-50 via-secondary-50 to-accent-50 border-2 border-primary-200 rounded-2xl shadow-lg p-6

input.default: border-2 border-primary-200 rounded-xl px-4 py-3 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary-400 focus:border-transparent transition-all duration-200
input.error: border-2 border-error-400 rounded-xl px-4 py-3 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-error-400 focus:border-transparent

badge.primary: bg-gradient-to-r from-primary-100 to-primary-200 text-primary-800 text-sm font-bold px-3 py-1 rounded-full shadow-sm
badge.secondary: bg-gradient-to-r from-secondary-100 to-secondary-200 text-secondary-800 text-sm font-bold px-3 py-1 rounded-full shadow-sm
badge.success: bg-gradient-to-r from-success-100 to-success-200 text-success-800 text-sm font-bold px-3 py-1 rounded-full shadow-sm
